definition: the tissue, covered by mucous membrane, of the jaws that surrounds the bases of the teeth, exude or form gum
details:
noun
- the tissue, covered by mucous membrane, of the jaws that surrounds the bases of the teeth
= example: the tissue, covered by mucous membrane, of the jaws that surrounds the bases of the teeth
= synonyms: gingiva
- a preparation (usually made of sweetened chicle) for chewing
= synonyms: chewing gum
- any of various trees of the genera Eucalyptus or Liquidambar or Nyssa that are sources of gum
= synonyms: gum tree
- wood or lumber from any of various gum trees especially the sweet gum
= synonyms: gumwood
- cement consisting of a sticky substance that is used as an adhesive
= synonyms: glue, mucilage
- any of various substances, soluble in water, that exude from certain plants
= example: any of various substances, soluble in water, that exude from certain plants
verb
- exude or form gum
= example: exude or form gum
- become sticky
- grind with the gums
= synonyms: mumble
- cover, fill, fix or smear with or as if with gum
= example: cover, fill, fix or smear with or as if with gum
